mapper.select: SELECT a.*, dep.airport_name AS departure_airport_name, arr.airport_name AS arrival_airport_name, dep.address AS departure_airport_address, arr.address AS arrival_airport_address, dep.phone AS departure_airport_phone, arr.phone AS arrival_airport_phone FROM airline a LEFT JOIN airport dep ON a.departure_airport_id = dep.airport_id LEFT JOIN airport arr ON a.arrival_airport_id = arr.airport_id

SELECT a.airline_id AS airlineId, a.airplane_id AS airplaneId, a.arrival_airport_id AS arrivalAirportId, a.departure_airport_id AS departureAirportId, a.boarding_gate AS boardingGate, a.price, a.departure_time AS departureTime, a.arrival_time AS arrivalTime, a.date, a.first_seat AS firstSeat, a.second_seat AS secondSeat, a.third_seat AS thirdSeat, a.duration, a.departure, a.arrival, dep.airport_name AS departureAirportName, arr.airport_name AS arrivalAirportName, dep.address AS departureAirportAddress, arr.address AS arrivalAirportAddress, dep.phone AS departureAirportPhone, arr.phone AS arrivalAirportPhone, FLOOR(a.price * 1.5) AS firstSeatPrice, FLOOR(a.price * 1.3) AS secondSeatPrice, FLOOR(a.price * 1.0) AS thirdSeatPrice FROM airline a LEFT JOIN airport dep ON a.departure_airport_id = dep.airport_id LEFT JOIN airport arr ON a.arrival_airport_id = arr.airport_id ${ew.customSqlSegment}
